block.p: Brooke Alyson Rosen, a daughter of Barna and Joel Rosen of Atlantic Beach, N.Y., was married last evening to Steven Miles Lucks, the son of Carole and Richard L. Lucks of Princeton, N.J. Rabbi Dennis Math officiated at the Woodmere Club in Woodmere, N.Y.
Mrs. Lucks, 29, is an associate accessories editor at Cosmopolitan magazine in New York. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin.

Brooke Alyson Rosen, a daughter of Barna and Joel Rosen of Atlantic Beach, N.Y., was married last evening to Steven Miles Lucks, the son of Carole and Richard L. Lucks of Princeton, N.J. Rabbi Dennis Math officiated at the Woodmere Club in Woodmere, N.Y.

Brooke Alyson Rosen, a daughter of Barna and Joel Rosen of Atlantic Beach, N.Y., was married last evening to Steven Miles Lucks, the son of Carole and Richard L. Lucks of Princeton, N.J. Rabbi Dennis Math officiated at the Woodmere Club in Woodmere, N.Y.
Mrs. Lucks, 29, is an associate accessories editor at Cosmopolitan magazine in New York. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin.
Mr. Lucks, 28, is a litigation associate in New York at Edwards Angell Palmer & Dodge, a law firm. He graduated from Lehigh University and Brooklyn Law School.
